name: 3DCarchess
0:
”Alexa, open three d. Car chess”
”Alexa, start three d. Car chess”
”Alexa, launch three d. Car chess”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: three d. car chess
des:
3d Car Chess is a worldwide orientation and concentration competition. 
Your sat nav guides you over a small chess board parking garage for cars, 3x3 squares by 3 floors.
A chess board has 3 fields to the north, by 3 fields to the east and starts with black. 
There is an elevator in the middle of the chessboard. If you drive onto the field North 2, East 2 ,on the lower floors, your car will go 1 floor higher. On the east side of field north 2, east 3 - quasi east 4 - there is a bridge to parking garage 2, on each floor. In the middle of the upper chess boards of parking garage 2, there is an elevator that goes one floor down, when you drive onto the middle field. 
Become a CC Grand Master and maybe the World Champion CC Maximus.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
